list.title: Monitor
list.description: Create a monitof for a time interval

list.title: Monitor#probeUrl
list.description: Add a probe to monitor the given url

list.title: Monitor#start
list.description: Start monitor. Currently this can only be called once

list.title: Monitor#stop
list.description: Stop monitoring and free up all resources.

list.title: StateLog
list.description: Create a StateLog for a given interval. Create a StateLog from its serialized JSON representation.

list.title: StateLog#stateHistory
list.description: Returns array of states corresponding to given time period

list.title: StateLog#update
list.description: Update StateLog with new state for given date/time. For proper synchronization, update the StateLog at the interval defined for the StateLog. The given date doesn't need to be exact, but it should "reasonably close". For historical accuracy, the given dates must not deviate from ideal "no-lag" update intervals by less than one interval.

list.title: StateLog.normalizeState
list.description: Normalize given state for storage. Normalization can remove unwanted properties. Normalization can also trim property values.
